title: The Sims 4 is finally getting the horse expansion players have been demanding for years
description: After a lot of rumor and speculation, EA says Sims players will "take the reins" this year.

title: You have to start a fresh Diablo 4 character for each battle pass
description: A lot of players were not aware that Diablo 4's seasons, and their battle passes, require seasonal characters.

title: Blizzard may remove upcoming WoW quest where players fix the timeline by ensuring a character is sexually assaulted
description: Blizzard thanked players for their feedback on the quest, but didn't say how it will address it.

title: Researchers smash 'energy density' record for rechargeable lithium batteries
description: The first ever 711 Wh/kg rechargeable lithium battery isn't ready for practical use, but it's exciting for mobile electronics.

title: The way I used to enjoy Diablo games has been replaced, and it sucks
description: The reek of corporate BS overpowers even the sulfurous fumes of Hell itself.

title: Blizzard is killing Hearthstone Classic and replacing it with a new mode called Twist
description: The rule set and card expansions will rotate every month.

title: Dota 2 is moving away from the battle pass model as Valve says there are better uses of dev time and most players 'never buy' one anyway
description: The studio is shifting away from battle passes to release more varied content at a more regular pace.

title: Little Kitty, Big City is like Untitled Goose Game for cat fanciers
description: Having the meowst fun.

title: The Cosmic Wheel Sisterhood lets you design your own tarot deck and seal your friend's fates, and I already know it's going to make me cry
description: Deconstructeam's melancholy tarot game will force your hand

title: This cosy city builder is like Dorfromantik and Animal Crossing had a space baby
description: Bubblegum Galaxy is an adorable tile-based city builder.

title: There's a foot posing simulator with a free demo on Steam if that's your scene
description: Make sure to get the right ankle.

title: Square Enix wins stunt of the day by commissioning actual swordsmith to make a giant Final Fantasy 16 weapon, then displaying it in the Tower of London
description: That truly is some next-level merch.

title: The Steam subreddit has suddenly become all about actual steam and steam trains
description: One of the many user protests against what's happening at Reddit.

title: Assassin's Creed Mirage's comparatively tiny map is great news for a series that needs more focus
description: Baghdad will be closer to Revelation's Constantinople and Unity's Paris, Ubisoft says.

title: Microsoft says latest Windows Kernel fix might actually break more things
description: A Windows Update that breaks stuff? Well, I never. In other news, Sun is hot.

title: Diablo 4 item power breakpoints and how they work
description: How good is your gear?

title: Chinese businesses and universities turn to back alley GPU dealers to power AI
description: The US said no more high-performance AI GPUs for China, but apparently some sellers have found a way around the strict export controls.

title: Amouranth gives Twitch the boot as Kick steals second streaming star in under 2 days
description: The streamer's announcement came barely 48 hours after xQc announced a $100 million dollar deal to stream on Kick.

title: Lies of P has a comeback mechanic, and now I want it in every soulslike
description: Lies of P's Estus Flask equivalent is a clever carrot on a stick

title: The 'miserable experience' of iFixit's new MacBook Air teardown has me yearning for the hot-swappable future of gaming laptops
description: Right to repair? Eh, kinda. Roll on Framework's modular gaming laptops.

title: Intel continues its spending spree with more major fab investments
description: Billions for expansions in Germany and Israel.

title: Today's Wordle hint and answer #731: Tuesday, June 20
description: Trouble solving today's Wordle? Here's the help you need.
